content: Time LOGO CONFIG Y1 V 69 63 1 2020-10-08 15:03:14 SYSTEM CONFIG Y1 F 80 368 8 2020-10-05 11:36:03 LOGO-1 CONFIG Y1 V 69 63 1 2020-06-24 09:14:16 4. Edit the original text by moving your cursor to the beginning of the line displaying LOGO CONFIG and entering the command XEDIT, or pressing F11: COPY / = = = (OLDDATE 444 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 Putting the log on panel in place Complete the following steps: 1. Query the system to show the list of minidisks that are owned by the z/VM Control Program: ===> CP QUERY CPDISK The output should look similar to that shown in Example 15-5. Example 15-5 Output from CP QUERY CPDISK Label Userid Vdev Mode Stat Vol-ID Rdev Type StartLoc EndLoc MNTCF1 MAINT 0CF1 A R/O VMBRES 95B2 CKD 39 158 MNTCF3 MAINT 0CF3 C R/O VMBRES 95B2 CKD 160 279 2. Issue a release request for the C-DISK: ===> CP CPRELEASE C CPRELEASE request for disk C scheduled. HCPZAC6730I CPRELEASE request for disk C completed. Ready; 3. Use VMLINK to copy the new logo
